attributes.action: Change the way in which children are educated in sex and relationships.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I, as a current student, believe that the state in which the youth of this nation are taught sex education is disgraceful. The government needs to set clear, consistent and compulsory guidelines for young adults to be taught about sex and relationships.
I believe that as in Holland with the introduction of guidelines, it will lead to lower cases of Sexual Transmitted Infections and Teenage Pregnancy.


Many Thanks

Sam Yarnold

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
